title: Champion of Apollo
name: Plucky - Champion of Apollo
printed_effect:
When you Normal Cast this Plucky you
can Search your deck for a Lyre of Apollo
and add it to your hand. When you Cast
a {solar} Rune you can return {solar} from your
Underworld to your Spirit Deck.
effect: When you Normal Cast this Plucky you can Search your deck for a Lyre of Apollo and add it to your hand. When you Cast a {solar} Rune you can return {solar} from your Underworld to your Spirit Deck.
